tables.help_category:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_help_category` (
  `category_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `category_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `category_sort_order` smallint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `category_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `category_slug` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`category_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.help_page:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_help_page` (
  `page_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `page_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `sort_order` smallint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `page_slug` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `redirect_to` varchar(200) NOT NULL,
  `page_title` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `page_content` text NOT NULL,
  `page_description` text,
  `updated_at` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '2015-10-10 10:10:10',
  PRIMARY KEY (`page_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.help_post:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_help_post` (
  `post_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `topic_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `post_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `post_sort_order` smallint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `post_title` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `post_slug` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `post_content` text NOT NULL,
  `post_description` text NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '2015-10-10 10:10:10',
  `updated_at` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '2015-10-10 10:10:10',
  PRIMARY KEY (`post_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.help_topic:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_help_topic` (
  `topic_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `category_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `topic_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `topic_sort_order` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `topic_title` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `topic_slug` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `topic_description` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`topic_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
